title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Operating Hours & Seasons         Aztec Ruins National Monument Visitor Center   Aztec Ruins National Monument is open every day. Hours are 8:00am to 5:00pm Labor Day through Memorial Day and 8:00am to 6:00pm Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day. No entry is permitted after hours. The park is closed Thanksgiving, December 25th, and January 1st.
